# ============================================ # Dockerfile para DESARROLLO # Con hot-reload y debugging habilitado # ============================================
FROM maven:3.9.6-eclipse-temurin-17-alpine
# Metadata LABEL maintainer="Finavex Team" LABEL environment="development"
# Instalar herramientas útiles para desarrollo RUN apk add --no-cache curl bash dumb-init
# Crear directorio de trabajo WORKDIR /app
# Copiar archivos de configuración Maven COPY pom.xml . COPY .mvn/ .mvn/
# Descargar dependencias RUN mvn dependency:go-offline -B || true
# Copiar código fuente COPY src/ ./src/
# Exponer puertos EXPOSE 8080 5005
# Variables de entorno para desarrollo ENV SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=dev \ JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS="-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=*:5005" \ MAVEN_OPTS="-XX:+UseContainerSupport -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=75.0"
# Ejecutar con Spring Boot DevTools (hot reload) ENTRYPOINT ["dumb-init", "--"] CMD ["mvn", "spring-boot:run", "-Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments=-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=*:5005"]
